com.gmarciani.gmparser.models.automaton

Class FiniteAutomaton<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmarciani.gmparser.models.automaton.AbstractAutomaton<V>
      • com.gmarciani.gmparser.models.automaton.FiniteAutomaton<V>

  • public class FiniteAutomaton<V>
extends AbstractAutomaton<V>

    The finite automaton model.

    Note that a finite automaton cannot make non deterministic moves or epsilon-moves.

    V is the type of the generic value of every state.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Giacomo Marciani
    See Also:
    AbstractAutomaton, TransitionGraph
